login.title: Login
login.description: Please sign in and pick up right where your journey paused.

register.title: Register
register.description: Register now to unlock your account and begin building the next chapter of your journey with us
register.email_description: We'll use this to contact you. We will not share your email with anyone else.
register.password_description: Password should be at least 8 characters including a number and a lowercase letter.
register.status_new_description: Check your inbox to verify your email and finish setting up your account.
register.status_exists_description: Sign in to continue with this email address.
register.status_block_description: We can't create an account with this email. Contact support if you think this is a mistake.

auth.terms_prefix: By creating an account, you agree to the

reset_password.reset_subtitle: Make sure your new password is strong and unique to keep your account protected and secure.
reset_password.request_subtitle: Enter your user account's verified email address and we will send you a password reset link.
reset_password.success_subtitle: Check your email for a link to reset your password. If it doesn't appear within a few minutes, check your spam folder.
reset_password.success_suffix: . Use it to set a new password.
reset_password.error_subtitle: We couldn't send the reset link. Please try again.
reset_password.error_default_message: Something went wrong. Please try again.

verify_email.title: Verify your email
verify_email.subtitle: We just need to confirm it's you. Click Verify Email to proceed safely.
verify_email.resend_subtitle: If the token expired or is invalid, request a fresh verification link.
verify_email.resend_description: We'll send a new verification link to your email address.

two_factor.totp_description: Enter the code from your two-factor authentication app or browser extension below.
two_factor.backup_description: Use one of your recovery codes to confirm it's you. Each code can be used only once.

not_found.title: Page Not Found
not_found.subtitle: We couldn't find the page you were looking for
not_found.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been moved. Check the URL or return to the homepage to continue browsing.

error_500.title: Something went wrong
error_500.subtitle: We hit an unexpected error while loading this page.
error_500.description: Try refreshing the page. If the problem continues, you can return to the homepage while we work on a fix.

quick_links.label: Quick paths
quick_links.home_description: Back to the landing page overview.
